ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: SAY: "I SEEK refuge with the Lord of men,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), say, "I seek protection from the Cherisher of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I take refuge of the One Who is the Lord of all mankind.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "I seek refuge with the Lord of An-Nas,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of men,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'I take refuge with the Lord of men,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘I seek the protection of the Lord of humans,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord and Cherisher of Mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'I take refuge with the Lord of people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [114:1] Say: ‘I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind, their Creator and their Possessor: they [mankind] have been singled out for mention here in order to honour them, and a preface to seeking refuge from the evil of the one who whispers in their hearts;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (Say: I seek refuge): '(Say: I seek refuge) and it is also said this means: I seek protection (in the Lord of mankind) in the Lord of the jinn and humankind,
